Klasse ConnectionHandler

java.lang.Object
model.server_client.ConnectionHandler
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Runnable
public class ConnectionHandler extends Object implements Runnable
Handles individual client connections, managing messages and game actions.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • ConnectionHandler

      public ConnectionHandler(Socket clientSocket, Server server, ServerController serverController, int id)
      Constructs a ConnectionHandler for a specific client.
      Parameter:
      clientSocket - the client socket
      server - the server instance
      serverController - the controller managing the server UI
      id - the unique ID assigned to the client

  • Methodendetails

      public void run()
      Handles the connection, starting message listeners and managing client communication.

      public void updateUserList(String[] users)
      Updates the user list for the client.
      Parameter:
      users - an array of usernames currently connected to the server
